00019 template<class T>
00020 CLine3D<T>::CLine3D()
00021 {
00022         m_P.Set(0,0,0);
00023         m_Dir.Set(1,0,0);
00024 }
00025 
00026 template<class T>
00027 CLine3D<T>::CLine3D(const CPoint3D<T>& P, const CVector3D<T>& Dir)
00028 {
00029         m_P=P;
00030         m_Dir=Dir;
00031 }
00032 
00033 template <class T>
00034 CLine3D<T>::CLine3D(const CLine3D<T>& Line3D)
00035 {
00036         // copy constructor
00037         *this=Line3D;
00038 }
00039 
00040 template<class T>
00041 CLine3D<T>& CLine3D<T>::operator=(const CLine3D<T>& Line3D)
00042 {
00043         m_P=Line3D.m_P;
00044         m_Dir=Line3D.m_Dir;
00045         return *this;
00046 }
00047 
00048 template<class T>
00049 bool CLine3D<T>::Set(const CPoint3D<T>& P, const CVector3D<T>& Dir)
00050 {
00051         if (Dir.IsZero()==true)
00052                 return false;
00053         m_P=P;
00054         m_Dir=Dir;
00055         return true;
00056 }
00057 
00058 template <class T>
00059 bool CLine3D<T>::PseudoIntersect(const CLine3D<T>& L, CPoint3D<T>& PseudoIntersectionPoint, T& MinDistance)
00060 {
00061         T t1,t2,N,D1sq,D2sq,D1D2,D1Q21,D2Q21;
00062         CVector3D<T> Buf,P1,P2;
00063         CVector3D<T> Q21;
00064         D1sq=GetDir()*GetDir();
00065         D2sq=L.GetDir()*L.GetDir();
00066         D1D2=GetDir()*L.GetDir();
00067         Q21=CVector3D<T>(L.GetPoint()-GetPoint());
00068         D1Q21=GetDir()*Q21;
00069         D2Q21=L.GetDir()*Q21;
00070         N=D1sq*D2sq-D1D2*D1D2;
00071         if (N==0) 
00072                 return false;//Linier parallelle
00073         
00074         t1=( D1Q21*D2sq-D1D2*D2Q21)/N;
00075         t2=(-D2Q21*D1sq+D1D2*D1Q21)/N;
00076         P1=CVector3D<T>(GetPoint())+GetDir()*t1;
00077         P2=CVector3D<T>(L.GetPoint())+L.GetDir()*t2;
00078         Buf=P2-P1;
00079         MinDistance=sqrt(Buf*Buf);
00080         Buf=P1+P2;
00081         PseudoIntersectionPoint=Buf*0.5;
00082         return true;
00083 }
00084
